name: qrmutasi-new
title: Get Mutasi QRIS (v2)
description: Mengambil riwayat transaksi QRIS dari API v2.
curl:
curl -X POST https://matic.eu.org/api/qrmutasi-new \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"auth_token":"USER_TOKEN", "auth_username":"USER_USERNAME", "page":"1"}'
